Test Leadership Congress New York

Onboarding Test Engineers

  • Home
27 June 2019

I have taken a part at Test Leadership Congress in New York, with my talk Onboarding Test Engineers. I talked about:

  • Why is it important to invest in onboarding
  • How to create a structured personalized space for new test engineers
  • What are the values for new joiners and organization.
